title: Ridge Vase
description:
The Ridge Vase (2019) by Studio Kaksikko is a sculptural vessel for arranging flowers that looks just as attractive when not in use. It features a slim profile – in ceramic or glass – with rounded sides and concave impressions that not only lend visual interest but also double as handles for secure repositioning. Made in Portugal.
  • A sculptural vessel that's just as beautiful full as empty.
  • Slim profile with rounded sides and concave impressions.
  • Designed by Studio Kaksikko for Muuto.
Brand
Muuto
General Dimensions
  • 13⅞" H 9⅛" W 3⅜" D
Product Weight
7 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled

Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Brugge Linen Pillow
description:
Brugge Linen Pillow (2025) adds natural comfort to any sofa, bed, or lounge chair. Made from 100% linen, the cover highlights the fabric's inherent beauty, featuring subtle variations in color that create depth and dimensionality. Breathable, soft, and expertly woven, Brugge is an everyday accent that just gets better with age. Down-and-feather insert included. Exclusive to DWR. Made in the USA.
  • 100% linen pillow cover.
  • Down-and-feather insert.
  • Breathable, soft, and expertly woven fabric.
  • Subtle variations in color create depth and dimensionality.
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 12" H 22" W 5" D
Product Weight
2 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
DWR honors a one (1) year warranty on all products. Brand-specific warranties may extend to longer periods.

title: Nougat Vase
description:
Based in Milan, Stories of Italy is a design studio that uses time-honored techniques to create beautifully crafted modern objects. Their Nougat Collection resulted from experiments reusing pieces of Murano blown glass, resulting in one-of-a-kind vases, bowls, and glasses that feature a mix of transparent colored shards against an opaque white background. Made in Italy.
  • A beautiful object for everyday use.
  • Mouth-blown Murano glass that is hand-finished.
  • Each piece is one of a kind.
Brand
Stories of Italy
General Dimensions
  • 7⅞" H 5⅛" DIA
Product Weight
2.75 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled

1-year warranty

title: Sheepskin Throw
description:
Our natural Sheepskin Throw brings textural counterpoint to modern interiors with its soft, downy pile. This sumptuous piece lends itself to being draped over your favorite furniture or used as a rug. Produced by a company with more than 80 years of experience in the industry, it’s refined using a tanning method that retains natural shape and suppleness. Hand-wash or dry-clean. Made in Argentina.
  • 100% sheepskin.
  • Can be used as a throw or rug.
  • Note: Being a natural material, slight variations in color and shape are to be expected and are not defects.
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 2" H 24" W 41" D
Product Weight
2 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Hemisphere Table Clock
description:
The Hemisphere Clock (2021) began with an investigation of wall clocks on the market, revealing a homogeneity of designs – mostly flat discs of about the same size. With Hemisphere, designer Henry Julier offers a counterpoint: The clock floats off the wall, a sculptural form that is as dynamic as it is functional. Includes a stand for optional tabletop use. Runs on one AA battery (not included). Made in Taiwan.
  • Graphic and sculptural form.
  • The clock face, held in place with magnets, can be easily removed for battery replacement.
  • A lack of hour marks and easy-to-read hands complement the bold nature of the clock case.
  • Hemisphere received a 2021 Esquire Home Design Award, given to “the 40 coolest items for your home."
  • Includes a stand for optional tabletop use.
  • Runs on one AA battery (not included).
Brand
Design Within Reach
General Dimensions
  • 5" H 5" W 2" D 5" DIA
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Angles Pillow by Paul Smith
description:
Maharam textiles reside in the permanent collections of MoMA, Cooper Hewitt, and the Art Institute of Chicago, among others. The Angles Pillow (2019), made in collaboration with renowned designer Paul Smith, combines luxe comfort and bold geometry to delight both the eye and hand. The pillow is crafted from a larger fabric pattern – colors and patterns may vary based on the repeat, making each one unique. Made in Germany.
  • Pattern by renowned British fashion designer Paul Smith.
  • A modern take on traditional jacquard.
  • Colors and patterns may vary based on the repeat.
Brand
Maharam
General Dimensions
  • 17" H 17" W 5" D

2.25 lbs

title: Kauffmann Mirrors
description:
Instantly add a focal point to any room with the gracefully arched Kauffmann Mirror (2023). Tall and elegant, it brings in light, creates dimension, and can serve as a full-length mirror or add drama above a chest or console. Made with a sleek aluminum frame, this versatile mirror suits a wide variety of interior styles. Made in China.
  • Choice of silver or black finish.
  • Two sizes.
  • Durable aluminum frame.

title: Checker Pillow by Alexander Girard
description:
Trained as an architect but proficient in nearly all design disciplines, Alexander Girard had a profound influence on 20th-century visual culture. During his 21 years as the director of design for the Herman Miller textile division, he designed more than 300 textiles, including Checker (1965). This cotton-blend pillow with feather filling is produced by renowned textile maker Maharam.
  • Removable cotton-blend cover.
  • Plush feather filling.
  • Choice of color.

Maharam

title: Wide Corduroy Pillow
description:
Maharam Design Studio specializes in the design and development of textiles for residential and commercial interiors. Balancing an appreciation of history with a focus on aesthetic and industrial innovation, Maharam’s textiles reside in the permanent collections of MoMA, Cooper Hewitt and the Art Institute of Chicago, among others. The Wide Corduroy Pillow (2020) features a 100% cotton pillowcase.
  • Cotton corduroy pillow in a variety of colors.
  • Plush feather filling.
